Crosshair X is a dope tool for FPS gamers who want to level up their aim. It’s a paid app on Steam, Microsoft Store, and Epic Games (dropped Feb 22, 2024) that lets you slap custom crosshairs on any shooter.

short_description: Overlay custom crosshairs on every game you play. Choose from thousands of unique crosshairs created by the Crosshair X community or design your own using the designer.
